name: Mini Purge
description:
A game made for Godot Jam #23. You play as a vampiric space warrior where you attempt to purge this alien world of its vicious bio-engineered invaders! Try your best to stay alive and collect as many points before reaching... The Edge...

--------------------

LeaderBoards: 
https://gamejolt.com/games/minipurge/518016/scores/525205/best

--------------------

Controls:
A/D - Left/Right
Shift - Run
Space - Jump
Jump Pack - Press & Hold Space w/ Jumping
Mouse - Aim
LMB - Shoot
W/S or Mouse Wheel - Switch Weapons
